agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Water & Rural Affairs TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon adjournment Monday, April 29, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Charles Perry SB 911 Hinojosa Relating to the supervision of water districts by the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality. SB 1446 Johnson | et al. Relating to performance standards for certain aboveground storage tanks. SB 1725 Lucio Relating to the valuation of a retail public utility or its facilities as part of a voluntary acquisition. SB 1998 Kolkhorst Relating to the deposit and allocation of certain funds to the horse industry escrow account. HB 1066 Ashby | et al. SP: Perry Relating to extensions of an expired permit for the transfer of groundwater from a groundwater conservation district. HB 1300 Hunter | et al. SP: Kolkhorst Relating to cultivated oyster mariculture; authorizing fees; requiring a permit; creating a criminal offense. HB 1506 Perez | et al. SP: Johnson Relating to authorizing a regulatory authority to establish reduced water and sewer utility rates funded by donations for the benefit of certain low-income customers. HB 1628 Morrison SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the authority of coastal counties to adopt certain rules for island parks, beach parks, and public beaches; creating a criminal offense. HB 1828 Martinez SP: Fallon Relating to prohibiting the sale and purchase of certain aquatic products; creating a criminal offense; increasing a criminal penalty. HB 1995 King, Tracy O. SP: Hinojosa Relating to the distribution to the Texas Racing Commission of certain money deducted from simulcast pari-mutuel pools. Bills added after last posting: HB 1995 SB 1998 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
